name: Hummus and chorizo salad
description: A quick and easy, filling salad.
keywords: weeknight, hummus, chorizo, grains, tomato, cucumber, salad
recipeIngredient: 2x 250g pre-cooked grains (I like Merchant Gourmet Persian style grains for this recipe)
30g fresh flat leaf parsley (coriander works as well)

recipeInstructions.name: Chop
recipeInstructions.text: Chop the chorizo, tomatoes, cucumber into half centimeter cubes, slices the spring onions and parsley, place in a large mixing bowl.

recipeInstructions.name: Reheat grains
recipeInstructions.text: Reheat the grains in a microwave according to packet instructions.

recipeInstructions.name: Combine and season
recipeInstructions.text: Put the grains in the mixing bowl, top with the hummus and mix, grind in fresh black pepper, season and serve.
